MCQ.question: Select the correct form.
MCQ.explanation: Sentence starts with a capital letter.

TrueFalse.question: The sun rise in the east.
He do not sing well.
TrueFalse.explanation: Should be 'He does not sing well'.

TrueFalse.question: Did you saw the movie?
TrueFalse.explanation: Should be 'Did you see the movie?'.

TrueFalse.question: She don't has a pen.
TrueFalse.explanation: Should be 'She doesn't have a pen'.

TrueFalse.question: We were playing in the garden.
He has did it.
TrueFalse.explanation: Should be 'He did it' or 'He has done it'.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct option.
options: If I was you, I will help.
If I were you, I would help.
If I was you, I would helps.

MCQ.question: Choose the correct sentence.
options: He has went to the store.
He have gone to the store.
He has gone to the store.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct sentence.
options: He is more senior than me.

MCQ.question: Which is correct?
options: I look forward to meet you.
I look forward to meeting you.
I looking forward to meet you.

MCQ.question: Select the right one.
options: He is married with a doctor.
He is married to a doctor.

MCQ.question: Which sentence is right?
options: It is high time he goes.
It is high time he go.
It is high time he went.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct sentence.
options: Despite of the rain, we went.
Inspite of the rain, we went.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct answer.
options: He has gave me a book.
He has given me a book.

MCQ.question: Pick the right one.
options: I look forward to see you.
I look forward to seeing you.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct answer.
options: It is high time you go.
It is high time you went.
It is high time you goes.

MCQ.question: Pick the correct sentence.
options: He is more senior than me.

MCQ.question: Which is correct?
options: I look forward to see him.
I look forward to seeing him.

MCQ.question: Choose the right option.
options: He is married with a doctor.
He is married to a doctor.

FillBlank.question: Despite ___ (of/—) the rain, we went out.

TrueFalse.question: Neither of them know the answer.
I look forward to meeting you.
Each of them know the truth.
It is I who am responsible.
Despite of the rain, we went out.
He is married to a doctor.
It is high time he goes.
